title: Support local nonprofits with Dark Star Cho’Gath

replies.body:
This story made me really think of the less fortunate out there, which saddens me, but it's so good to see Riot do great things like this, it almost brought happy tears to my eyes.{{item:3070}} 
Much respect Riot.
Excellent stuff Riot. Your work off the game is always full of class and professionalism.
great idea but sadly chinas foundation is the owner ,which is fucking bullshit
